name: MIT@2:50 - Ten minutes for your mind
description:
Ten minutes for your mind

@2:50 every day at 2:50 pm in multiple time zones

Almost everything works better again if you unplug it for a bit, including your mind.* Stop by and unplug. Get the benefits of mindfulness without the fuss.

@2:50 meets at the same time every single day for ten minutes of quiet together.

No pre-requisite, no registration needed.

Visit the website to view all @2:50 time zones each day.

at250.org or at250.mit.edu
